Articles.Content: Well hello i just wanted to say hi since i'm new , Any 1 ever wish they could build ships in parts? Like you know how you can take of a lower section and then it will become transparent and you cant edit it? i wish we could split stuff up in parts and work on them seperatly.

I think what you are referring to are called Assemblies. Eventually you will be able to build assemblies, like satellites or lifter designs, then save them so they can be added in like a part when building a new craft. No ETA on when it will be added though.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Verry nice thats not whati meant but! that will be a very nice feature *highfives*.What i meant how ever is just when you are in the builder and you are makign complex peices ect somtimes its a pain in the but because other parts obstruct some access points and parts, so in turn i find myself disconectign parts of the ship in order to build up on the main body! What i meant is when you disconect parts it would be cool to be able to work directly on the other parts and not just the part with the Capsul, know what i mean? but so far i love this game
